text: (miru kuda) gatincina mi purvikula vantivaru. Varu mikante ekkuva balavantulu, dhanavantulu mariyu adhika santanam galavaru. Varu tama bhagapu aihika sukhalanu anubhavincaru. Miru kuda mi purvikulu anubhavincinatlu mi bhagapu aihika sukhalanu anubhavincaru. Varu padi natuvanti vyartha vadopavadalalo miru kuda paddaru. Ilanti vari karmalu ihalokanlonu mariyu paralokanlonu vyarthamavutayi. Mariyu ilanti varu! Vire nastaniki guri ayyevaru
